about_the_game:
The Wizard Pack DLC is designed for those who want to get the most out of the Lust Academy world. 

The Wizard Pack includes additional content to help you navigate through the game, get to know your favorite characters better, and enjoy more renders and artwork. 

The DLC includes:

  • Character BIO cards with their story, hobbies, and interests. - Learn more about your favorite characters. This information will allow you to immerse yourself in the game better and build a stronger bond with your love interests.
  • Full HD character renders - Unique, high-quality renders of the main characters from Lust Academy will bring you true aesthetic pleasure and serve as a great wallpaper for your desktop.
  • Lustagram app picture set - Vivid, engaging, personal, and touching pictures from the Lustagram game app are available to you in a convenient way.
  • Unique renders made for patrons - This DLC also includes all the diverse, high-quality renders with the game's characters in unusual circumstances that we created at the request of our patrons.
  • Walkthrough Guide - A guide to the game that includes tips on love storylines and the most effective ways to earn money and house points.

Buy the Wizard Pack and enjoy it all now! 

DLC Can be found in the root folder of the game

Legal Disclaimers:
All characters are 18 age or older even if specified otherwise

content_descriptors.notes:
Legal Disclaimers:
All characters are 18 age or older

This game contains violence, obscene scenes (naked girls and flirting scenes with sexual overtones, sex scenes), Rude humor, blood, scenes that depict smoking, or infrequent use of profanity.
All sexual acts in the game are consensual.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (x86, x86_64)
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon®
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU capable of showing images
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU capable of showing images
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

name: Lust Academy - Wizard Pack

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon®
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU capable of showing images
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

short_description: The Wizard Pack includes additional content for Lust Academy. Learn more about your favorite characters with BIO cards, enjoy a pack of beautiful renders from Lustagram App and get exclusive renders created especially for our patrons. And don't forget about the exclusive Game Guide!
